content: harvey is a little more complicated than previous blanket patterns i ve shared with you all but i really really enjoyed knitting him so i hope the fact he s a little more technically challenging won t put you off - i promise you that even though he s a 20 row repeat incorporating a stitch pattern that s a little more complex than my other blankets he s still an enjoyable knit that can be tackled by anyone who can knit and purl confidently gauge is not important for this blanket video tutorial linked at the bottom of the post
